title: Process Return for a Defective Item
description: A customer reports that a product stopped working within the warranty period and wants a replacement.

tasks.description: Find the customer's original order to verify the purchase date and warranty eligibility.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the item is still within its 1-year warranty period.

tasks.description: Create a return authorization for the defective item and a new order for a replacement.
Log the defect reason to track product quality issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs 'Power Failure' as the defect reason for the product.
